entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 9:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wet flurries over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming east 20 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water early in the evening. Wind becoming light early in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
